title: Ranked Lobby Glitch
body:
So im plat 3 in promos to plat 2 and this has now happened 2 times and im not very happy and both on different days (during this week)
And it wasnt just me my duo partner in the lobby got it aswell
So what it is (the glitch) 
So you're in champion select and its just before your turn and the enemy team lock in and for a split second it shows your pick then goes back to grey saying its the enemy's pick still for another 60 seconds and by the time the 60 seconds is up you get kicked out and lose lp / Promo loss and you get a 5 min leave timer plz fix

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
